‚Ä¢ Our team maintains the TCP/Websocket long-lived framework, and it's the project's foundation. The throughput and performance surpassed the native Golang net library as the connection pool is rewritten based on the Epoll model that could guarantee a load of more than 600,000 users to be online simultaneously.
‚Ä¢ The RTM service consisted of 9 microservices, provided Chat Room, Bullet Chat, Customer Support Live Chat, and other capabilities for multiple business projects that could quickly access this service. ‚Ä¢ As the lead engineer for this project, I redesigned the overall architecture of the RTM Services as I pushed the entire system transfer to Kubernetes. The original problem of inability to Autoscaling was resolved and provided the ability to Gracefully-Shutdown then improved the system availability.

Achievements

‚Ä¢ Built-in Message Sequence model, ACK (Acknowledgement) mechanism and retry strategy ensure the uniqueness, sequence, and more than 98% arrival rate of messages.

‚Ä¢ Implemented gateway discovery and registration mechanism, conquered the instability of the gateway during Autoscaling for stable execution of message delivery.

‚Ä¢ Built detailed monitoring dashboards using Prometheus and Grafana to observe message arrival rate, user load, delivery delay, QPS of various APIs, etc. ‚Ä¢ Worked with DevOps engineers to develop the CI/CD process and different environment isolation.
